name: Harmony with Nature
description: Connect with the ancient spirits of nature
and become one with the natural world.
Learn from the wisdom of the forest and
master the primal forces of earth and life.

objectives.wisdom_test: Test of Natural Wisdom: Commune with ancient trees
objectives.harmony_test: Test of Elemental Harmony: Balance all four elements
objectives.communion_test: Test of Life Communion: Heal a dying forest

dialogs.start: Nature calls to those who truly listen. Do you hear its voice?
dialogs.requirements: To become one with nature, you must first understand its ancient wisdom.
dialogs.wisdom_trial: The trees have witnessed eons. Learn from their silent wisdom.
dialogs.harmony_trial: All elements must be in balance. Earth, air, fire, and water as one.
dialogs.communion_trial: Life flows through all things. Channel this energy to heal what is broken.
dialogs.complete: You are now one with nature. Its power flows through you.
